chunks.lyrics: Piano Part of the great song Apocalypse Pleas by Muse tabbed for guitar.
(If the sixteenth notes are too fast, just play eigth notes instead)
This Part is a little bit tricky. The first 3 notes of one arpeggio (consisting
of 7 notes) are 3 sixteenth triplets. The next 4 are 4 thirty-second notes.
Just try to keep the first and the last note of an arpeggio in time.
The ","-Signs shall show the sixteenth beats.
Ending (not really possible for guitar, anyway here are the chords)
